header.title: Overview
header.content:
Overview

Face Service is designed for face recognition use cases.

Function Requirements

To support face recognition user cases, the Face Service needs to support the following features:

  • A user can input a image for face detection.
  • A user can register a face image for further recognition.
  • A user can input a image for face recognition.
  • A user can connect a RTSP stream for recognition all the time.

Changelog

  • Jun 24, 2019

    • Refactor the Face Service API -0.1.0- by Jarret.YM.Lu

  • Jun 13, 2019

    • Initialize the Face Service API -0.0.0- by Alvin.CY.Shih

High Level Design

Collection

Create Collection

在新增人脸之前，必须先有Collection，因此若没有Collection时必须先建立一个以供使用，相当一个人脸库，可根据需要创建ExternalId与Description，用于关联外部资料或辅助描述该库。

Delete Collection

当一个Collection不再需要时，可以进行删除，惟注册于该Collection之人脸资料，也将一并删除。

Face

Face Detection

用户可输入一张照片，以检测出当中有多少张人脸及其资讯

{
  "FaceInfos"[
    {
     "Confidence": 0.996530,
     "BoundingBox": [128, 204, 49, 76]
    },
    {
     "Confidence": 0.876612,
     "BoundingBox": [330, 771, 82, 121]
    }
  ]
}

Create Face

新增一张人脸影像到Collection，并根据需要创建ExternalId，用于关联外部人员资料库。

Get Face

{
     "FaceId": 2,
     "CollectionId": 1,
     "ExternalId": "860002",
     "Image": "https://db.face.com/2.jpg",
     "Time":"2019-06-13 10:41:09"
}

FaceId为Face Service中unique identifier。

Recognition

Recognize by Image

用户可输入一张包含一个或多个人脸的照片，用以比对出相关Collections中的人脸资料，辨认的结果输出为一FaceComparisons阵列，数量为输入照片侦测的人脸数，每个元素包含FaceInfo与FaceMatches。 FaceInfo: 输入照片中该人脸的资讯 FaceMatches: 从Collections中比对到的人脸资料，若没比对到则为空。

{
  "FaceComparisons":[
    {
      "FaceInfo":{
        "Confidence": 0.996530,
        "BoundingBox": [128, 204, 49, 76]
      },
      "FaceMatches":[
        {
          "Face":{
            "FaceId": 1,
            "CollectionId": 1,
            "ExternalId": "860001",
            "Image": "https://db.face.com/8837382.jpg"
          },
          "Similarity":0.965112
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "FaceInfo":{
        "Confidence": 0.876612,
        "BoundingBox": [330, 771, 82, 121]
      },
      "FaceMatches":[]
    }
  ]
}

Stream

Create Stream

用户可将一监视摄影机之RTSP Stream，导入此Face Service用以时时比对人脸库

Get Results

用户可以间隔一段时间Polling某一个活动中Stream的辨认结果，由于辨认结果会随着时间而增加，用户可以藉由输入NextIterator避免polling重复的辨认信息。

{
  "Recognitions":[
    {
      "FaceId":1
      "CollectionId":1
      "ExternalId": "860001",
      "Image": "https://db.face.com/face_1.jpg",
      "CaptureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461597.jpg"
      "Source":"rtsp://10.167.218.79:554/live"
      "Time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41.597"
    },
    {
      "FaceId":2
      "CollectionId":1
      "ExternalId": "860002",
      "Image": "https://db.face.com/face_2.jpg"
      "CaptureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461645.jpg"
      "Source":"rtsp://10.167.218.79:554/live"
      "Time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41.645"
    },
    {
      "FaceId":-1
      "CollectionId":-1
      "ExternalId": "",
      "Image": ""
      "CaptureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471463251.jpg"
      "Source":"rtsp://10.167.218.79:554/live"
      "Time":"2019-06-14 08:17:43.251"
    }
  ],
  "NextIterator":"xxEREdf5556fdsFDGeQHJUI87hEfGjNV"
}

Subscribe Stream

用户可以订阅Stream，订阅后，该Stream会将辨认结果透过订阅之PostUrl callback.

[
    {
      "FaceId":1
      "CollectionId":1
      "ExternalId": "860001",
      "Image": "https://db.face.com/face_1.jpg",
      "CaptureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461597.jpg"
      "Source":"rtsp://10.167.218.79:554/live"
      "Time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41.597"
    },
    {
      "FaceId":2
      "CollectionId":1
      "ExternalId": "860002",
      "Image": "https://db.face.com/face_2.jpg"
      "CaptureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461645.jpg"
      "Source":"rtsp://10.167.218.79:554/live"
      "Time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41.645"
    }
]
